description:
You will learn how to be resourceful, how to say "No," build a strong support system, eliminate bad habits, create a solid plan to reach goals, self motivate, how to communicate effectively with men and more. This course includes a printable workbook as well as the book from which the course was created.

This course may take 2-3 months to complete if you go at a slow and steady pace. It has exercises that you will complete in between lectures. More advanced learners may complete the course in a matter of weeks.

You're learning from someone who has experienced feelings of unworthiness, self doubt, and stagnation for years, so now you're going to learn how to get out of that rut just like I did. We're no different in terms of our ability to overcome challenges. The difference may be that when I was finally ready for a change, I acted upon it. Taking this course is your action to being unstoppable in your own life.
title: Learn the Secrets to Being an Unstoppable Woman
